General.Name: Karya Bersama Anugerah Pt
General.Description: PT Karya Bersama Anugerah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Indonesia. The company operates through Developer and Estate Management segments. It builds residential properties, land houses, and shop houses. PT Karya Bersama Anugerah Tbk was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Balikpapan, Indonesia.
